attributes.action: Order patrol boats to turn around any illegal immigrant rafts.
attributes.additional_details:
Unregulated illegal immigration can pose a potential security risk, as it becomes difficult to vet and screen individuals who enter the country without proper documentation. This can be exploited by individuals with malicious intentions, such as criminals or potential terrorists.

Unregulated illegal immigration can affect the job market and wage levels. The government aims to manage immigration to mitigate potential negative impacts on the economy and labour market.
attributes.background: The petition aims to urge Parliament to take decisive actions in securing the nation's borders, particularly stopping illegal immigrants from getting in to our country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Create international waters in Dover Strait, and turn back migrant boats
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641012

Investigate the legality of pushing back boats seeking to enter the UK illegally
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639252
